param.name: validityStart
param.help: Validity start date for the REF_APP_FluxConversion file (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS[.SSS])

param.name: throughputFilename
param.help: filename for telescope throughput vs wavelength, format: REF_APP_Throughput.fsd

param.name: QEFilename
param.help: filename for quantum efficiency vs wavelength, format: REF_APP_QE.fsd

param.name: SEDFilename
param.help: filename for SED reference file, format: REF_APP_SEDTeff.fsd. Any string not containing REF_APP_SEDTeff will result in a black body being used instead.

param.name: gaiaBand
param.help: Flag to indicate whether to use the Gaia band or the V-band as the reference passband

param.name: blackBodyOffset
param.help: Empirically derived offset correction for (CHEOPS mag - Gaia mag) for TEff>7200K, when black body spectra are used to model the stellar spectra

param.name: fitIntercept
param.help: Intercept of linear fit to (observed flux / predicted flux) vs effective temperature

param.name: fitSlope
param.help: Slope of linear fit to (observed flux / predicted flux) vs effective temperature
